name: Drawing and Coloring Book - Doodle Pad

description:
Drawing and Coloring Book is the best drawing and coloring app for making your kid creative. Every child is an artist, so help yours develop their imagination! Children find countless hours of fun in this app as they explore their creativity through drawing, coloring, and creating art.
Drawing and Coloring Book for Kids has two modes to inspire a lifelong love for art and learning:

Children can experiment with different brush sizes and colors as they paint. Your child (and you!) will love drawing.
